entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 5:17AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Widely Scattered Strong Thunderstorms Possible Through This Evening... Isolated to widely scattered thunderstorms expected to develop across the Interior and Western Interior this afternoon and evening. Some storms could be strong, with frequent lightning, gusty winds, small hail and heavy downpours are all possible.
